channel.title: Help! a few things!
channel.description:
1. Hello - does anyone have the varrock wildy rats autospawns? Would help alot if you do, please post!
Thanks
2.Hi guys, im using devo 2.7 to make my own version of rs, which will be imense :D
however.. i've stumbled upon a rock. I need to get magic short bow working on nps and player... and i really need help with it!
if someone could please tell me how to, or if this isnt the source to be using, tell me a good base to make a version of RS?
it's 317, old interface etc, like 2005.
tyvm[br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 08, 2009, 03:28:21 am[/size][hr]btw, i click special and nothing happens, it just hits normally still and spec stays on till i turn it back off..
thx

item.title: Help! a few things!
item.dc:creator: @0mg_Noob 0mg Noob
item.description:
@0mg_Noob wrote:

thanks, someone help please?

item.title: Help! a few things!
item.dc:creator: @0mg_Noob 0mg Noob
item.description:
@0mg_Noob wrote:

[quote=“nobiwa666, post:2, topic:300960”]u need to find the item code of a weapon with specials
find that and u will c the special methods
but u said u wanan amke an inmense thing.
put that out your head because if you can’t do this you can’t make an inmense server.[/quote]

Naw i can usually do it because epic ancients showed me how, but this coding is really weird compared to normal :o[br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 08, 2009, 04:01:48 am[/size][hr]nothing like a bit of good spirit eh…

Read full topic
